foreignNames.text:
水晶の岩屋が戦場に出たとき、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
{T}：{C}を加える。
{1}, {T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignNames.name: Gruta dos Cristais
foreignNames.text:
Quando Gruta dos Cristais entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{1}, {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.

foreignNames.name: 水晶石室
foreignNames.text:
当水晶石室进战场时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
{T}：加{C}。
{1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

originalText:
When Crystal Grotto enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Geothermal Bog
text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Geothermal Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: There are still a few places where the natural dangers outweigh even those posed by Phyrexian sleeper agents.

foreignNames.name: Geothermisches Moor
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}.)
Das Geothermische Moor kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Es gibt noch einige wenige Orte, an denen die natürlichen Gefahren noch größer sind als diejenigen durch phyrexianische Schläfer-Agenten.

foreignNames.name: Ciénaga geotérmica
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {R}.)
La Ciénaga geotérmica entra al campo de batalla girada.
foreignNames.flavor: Todavía existen algunos lugares donde incluso la amenaza de los agentes durmientes de Pirexia palidece frente a los peligros naturales.

foreignNames.name: Marécage géothermique
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}.)
Le Marécage géothermique arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Il subsiste encore quelques lieux où les dangers naturels dépassent même ceux que posent les agents en sommeil phyrexians.

foreignNames.name: Acquitrino Geotermico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}.)
L'Acquitrino Geotermico entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Esistono ancora alcuni luoghi dove i pericoli naturali superano persino quelli rappresentati dagli agenti dormienti Phyrexiani.

foreignNames.name: 地熱の沼
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。）
地熱の沼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: ファイレクシア人の潜伏工作員との遭遇よりも危険を伴う自然の脅威がいまだにいくつか存在する。

foreignNames.name: Charco Geotérmico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {B} ou {R}.)
Charco Geotérmico entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Ainda existem alguns poucos lugares onde os perigos naturais superam até mesmo os apresentados pelos agentes adormecidos phyrexianos.

foreignNames.name: 地热腐沼
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{R}。）
地热腐沼须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 如今在某些地方，仍然是自然变化比潜藏密探更凶险。

originalText:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Geothermal Bog enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Haunted Mire
text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
Haunted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Some of the nature spirits and wraiths that haunt Urborg take offense at the term "ghost town."

foreignNames.name: Verwunschenes Schlammloch
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {G}.)
Das Verwunschenes Schlammloch kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Einige der Naturgeister und Wraiths, die in Urborg spuken, nehmen an dem Begriff „Geisterstadt" Anstoß.

foreignNames.name: Cenagal embrujado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {G}.)
El Cenagal embrujado entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: A algunos espíritus y espectros de la naturaleza que moran en Urborg les ofende profundamente el término "pueblo fantasma".

foreignNames.name: Fondrière hantée
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B} or {G}.)
La Fondrière hantée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
foreignNames.flavor: Certains des esprits de la nature et des spectres qui hantent Urborg s'offusquent du terme « ville fantôme ».

foreignNames.name: Pantano Infestato
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G}.)
Il Pantano Infestato entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Alcuni degli spiriti naturali e degli spettri che infestano Urborg non amano il termine "città fantasma".

foreignNames.name: 憑依されたぬかるみ
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{B}か{G}を加える。）
憑依されたぬかるみはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: アーボーグに取り憑いている自然の霊や悪霊の中には「ゴーストタウン」という呼称に気を悪くするものもいる。

foreignNames.name: Lodaçal Assombrado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {B} ou {G}.)
Lodaçal Assombrado entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Alguns espíritos da natureza e aparições que assombram Urborg se ofendem com o termo "cidade fantasma".

foreignNames.name: 遭祟泥沼
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{G}。）
遭祟泥沼须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 部分盘踞在乌尔博格的精怪和鬼魂觉得「鬼城」这称呼颇不礼貌。

originalText:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
Haunted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Idyllic Beachfront
text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Idyllic Beachfront enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: In the tradition of the original Tolarian Academy, every Tolarian campus is built near a body of water.

foreignNames.name: Idyllischer Strand
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.)
Der Idyllische Strand kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: In der Tradition der ursprünglichen Akademie von Tolaria wird jeder tolarianische Campus in der Nähe eines Gewässers gebaut.

foreignNames.name: Litoral idílico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.)
El Litoral idílico entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: Según la tradición de la primera Academia tolariana, todos los campus tolarianos se construyen cerca de una masa de agua.

foreignNames.name: Plage idyllique
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.)
La Plage idyllique arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans la tradition de la première Académie tolariane, chaque campus tolarian est construit proche d'une étendue d'eau.

foreignNames.name: Litorale Idilliaco
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.)
Il Litorale Idilliaco entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Per mantenere viva la tradizione dell'Accademia di Tolaria originale, ogni campus di Tolaria viene eretto nelle vicinanze di uno specchio d'acqua.

foreignNames.name: 理想的な浜方
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。）
理想的な浜方はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 元祖トレイリアのアカデミーの伝統にならい、トレイリアの全キャンパスは水際に建設されている。

foreignNames.name: Beira-mar Idílica
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.)
Beira-mar Idílica entra no campo de batalha virada.
foreignNames.flavor: Seguindo a tradição da Academia Tolariana original, todo campus tolariano é construído próximo à água.

foreignNames.name: 田园滩岸
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{U}。）
田园滩岸须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 按照旧陶拉里亚大学院的传统，每个陶拉里亚校园都傍水而建。

originalText:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Idyllic Beachfront enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Karplusan Forest
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Between jagged, snowcapped peaks, the dense bands of hardy evergreens provide the perfect cover for roving bands of orc and goblin raiders.

foreignNames.name: Karplusanischer Wald
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}. Der Karplusanische Wald fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Zwischen gezackten, schneebedeckten Gipfeln bieten die dichten Streifen aus robusten immergrünen Pflanzen die perfekte Deckung für umherziehende Ork- und Goblin-Banden.

foreignNames.name: Foresta karplusana
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G}. La Foresta karplusana te hace 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: Las densas filas de árboles perennes, enmarcadas por picos escarpados y cubiertos de nieve, son el escondite perfecto para las bandas ambulantes de incursores orcos y trasgos.

foreignNames.name: Forêt de Karpluse
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}. La Forêt de Karpluse vous inflige 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Parmi les pics neigeux acérés, des bandes de forêt à feuilles persistantes fournissent l'abri parfait aux bandes nomades de pillards orques et gobelins.

foreignNames.name: Foresta di Karplus
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}. La Foresta di Karplus ti infligge 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: Tra i picchi innevati e frastagliati, i densi appezzamenti di robusti sempreverdi offrono il rifugio perfetto per le bande nomadi di razziatori orchi e goblin.

foreignNames.name: カープルーザンの森
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。カープルーザンの森はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 鋭く切り立ち雪を被った山頂の間に鬱蒼と生える常緑樹は、放浪するオークやゴブリンの略奪者にとって恰好の隠れ蓑になる。

foreignNames.name: Floresta Karplusana
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}. Floresta Karplusana causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Situados entre picos escarpados cobertos de neve, os densos bosques perenes proporciornam a cobertura perfeita para bandos de saqueadores itinerantes de orcs e goblins.

foreignNames.name: 卡普路桑森林
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。卡普路桑森林对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在嶙峋覆雪的山峰之间，茂密的耐寒常青树为四处游荡的半兽人和鬼怪突击队提供了完美掩护。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

name: Molten Tributary
text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Though dangerous, Shiv teems with both life and mana, making it a tempting destination for ambitious mages.

foreignNames.name: Geschmolzener Zufluss
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {R}.)
Der Geschmolzene Zufluss kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Shiv ist zwar gefährlich, aber auch voller Leben und Mana, was es für ambitionierte Magier zu einem verlockenden Reiseziel macht.

foreignNames.name: Afluente fundido
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {U} o {R}.)
El Afluente fundido entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: A pesar de sus peligros, en Shiv abundan tanto la vida como el maná, lo que lo convierte en un destino muy tentador para los magos más ambiciosos.

foreignNames.name: Chenal en fusion
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}.)
Le Chenal en fusion arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Bien que dangereux, Shiv est une explosion de vie et de mana, ce qui en fait une destination attrayante pour les mages ambitieux.

foreignNames.name: Affluente Magmatico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}.)
L'Affluente Magmatico entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Per quanto pericolosa, Shiv pullula di vita e di mana, che ne fanno una meta allettante per i maghi più ambiziosi.

foreignNames.name: 溶鉄の支流
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。）
溶鉄の支流はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 危険であるにしろ、シヴは生命とマナを湛え、野心家の邪術師にとっては魅力的な場所なのである。

foreignNames.name: Afluente Derretido
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {U} ou {R}.)
Afluente Derretido entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Mesmo perigosa, Shiv é rica em vida e mana, o que faz dela um destino tentador para magos ambiciosos.

foreignNames.name: 熔火支流
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{R}。）
熔火支流须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 西瓦虽然危机四伏，但其勃勃生机与充沛法力仍令无数有志法师心向往之。

originalText:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Plaza of Heroes
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.
{3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Gedenkplatz der Helden
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Gib dieses Mana nur aus, um einen legendären Zauberspruch zu wirken.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe einer legendären bleibenden Karte, die du kontrollierst.
{3}, {T}, schicke den Gedenkplatz der Helden ins Exil: Eine legendäre Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Fluchsicherheit und Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Plaza de los héroes
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo legendario.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color entre los permanentes legendarios que controlas.
{3}, {T}, exiliar la Plaza de los héroes: La criatura legendaria objetivo gana las habilidades de antimaleficio e indestructible hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Esplanade des héros
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort légendaire.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix parmi les couleurs des permanents légendaires que vous contrôlez.
{3}, {T}, exilez l'Esplanade des héros : une créature légendaire ciblée acquiert la défense talismanique et l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Piazza degli Eroi
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia leggendaria.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore tra i permanenti leggendari che controlli.
{3}, {T}, Esilia la Piazza degli Eroi: Una creatura leggendaria bersaglio ha anti-malocchio e indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 英雄の公有地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、伝説の呪文を唱えるためにしか支払えない。
{T}：あなたがコントロールしている伝説のパーマネントの中の色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{3},{T},英雄の公有地を追放する：伝説のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは呪禁と破壊不能を得る。

foreignNames.name: Praça dos Heróis
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar uma mágica lendária.
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor entre as permanentes lendárias que você controla.
{3}, {T}, exile Praça dos Heróis: A criatura lendária alvo ganha resistência a magia e indestrutível até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: 群英广场
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放传奇咒语。
{T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控之传奇永久物所具有的任一颜色。
{3}，{T}，放逐群英广场：目标传奇生物获得辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.
{3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Radiant Grove
text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Radiant Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Yavimaya's inhabitants are dedicated to protecting its unspoiled jungle from the scourge of artifice.

foreignNames.name: Strahlender Hain
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {W}.)
Der Strahlende Hain kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Bewohner von Yavimaya setzen alles daran, seinen unberührten Dschungel vor der Geißel des Handwerks zu schützen.

foreignNames.name: Arboleda radiante
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {G} o {W}.)
La Arboleda radiante entra al campo de batalla girada.
foreignNames.flavor: Los moradores de Yavimaya protegen su inmaculada selva del azote del artificio.

foreignNames.name: Bosquet radieux
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W}.)
Le Bosquet radieux arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Les habitants de la Yavimaya sont dévoués à la protection de sa jungle vierge du fléau de l'artifice.

foreignNames.name: Boschetto Radioso
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W}.)
Il Boschetto Radioso entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli abitanti di Yavimaya sono dediti alla protezione della giungla incontaminata dalla piaga dell'artificio.

foreignNames.name: 光輝の木立ち
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{G}か{W}を加える。）
光輝の木立ちはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: ヤヴィマヤの住人は、大量の人工物からその無垢なる森を守ることを使命としている。

foreignNames.name: Bosque Radiante
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {G} ou {W}.)
Bosque Radiante entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Os habitantes de Yavimaya protegem sua selva imaculada do flagelo do artifício.

foreignNames.name: 华光树丛
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{G}或{W}。）
华光树丛须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 亚维马雅丛林尚未受战火波及，而其间生灵均致力保卫此处免遭奇械劫运降临。

originalText:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Radiant Grove enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Sacred Peaks
text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Sacred Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Everyone is welcome in the floating Serran cities, though few but the most faithful attempt the ascent.

foreignNames.name: Heilige Gipfel
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {W}.)
Die Heiligen Gipfel kommen getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: In den schwebenden Städten Serras sind alle willkommen, doch wenige außer den Treuesten versuchen den Aufstieg.

foreignNames.name: Cumbres sagradas
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {W}.)
Las Cumbres sagradas entran al campo de batalla giradas.
foreignNames.flavor: Las ciudades flotantes de Serra acogen a todo el mundo, pero solo los más fervorosos creyentes intentan alcanzarlas.

foreignNames.name: Pics sacrés
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {W}.)
Les Pics sacrés arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagés.
foreignNames.flavor: Tout le monde est le bienvenu dans les cités flottantes de Serra, mais seuls les plus croyants tentent l'ascension.

foreignNames.name: Picchi Sacri
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {W}.)
I Picchi Sacri entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpati.
foreignNames.flavor: Chiunque è il benvenuto nelle città fluttuanti di Serra, ma solo i più fedeli tentano l'ascesa.

foreignNames.name: 聖なる峰
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{R}か{W}を加える。）
聖なる峰はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: セラの浮遊都市は誰でも受け入れるが、そこに昇ろうと試みるのは最も信心深い者だけである。

foreignNames.name: Picos Sagrados
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {R} ou {W}.)
Picos Sagrados entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Todos são bem-vindos nas cidades flutuantes de Serra, embora apenas os mais devotos arrisquem a subida.

foreignNames.name: 圣洁山峰
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{W}。）
圣洁山峰须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 漂浮空中的撒拉都市欢迎所有人到访，但仅有寥寥无几的虔诚信徒才会尝试跻身其间。

originalText:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Sacred Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Shivan Reef
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

foreignNames.name: Shivanisches Riff
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {R}. Das Shivanische Riff fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Das kochende Meer rund um Shiv bot einen willkommenen Schutz für die erneuerte Manabarkasse.

foreignNames.name: Arrecife shivano
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {R}. El Arrecife shivano te hace 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: Los mares hirvientes de Shiv ofrecían una conveniente capa de protección a la instalación de maná reformada.

foreignNames.name: Brisants shivâns
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}. Les Brisants shivâns vous infligent 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Les mers bouillonnantes entourant Shiv fournissaient une précieuse barrière de protection pour la Plate-forme de mana récupérée.

foreignNames.name: Barriera di Shiv
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}. La Barriera di Shiv ti infligge 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: I mari ribollenti intorno a Shiv rappresentano un gradito livello di protezione per il rivendicato Impianto di Mana.

foreignNames.name: シヴの浅瀬
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。シヴの浅瀬はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: シヴ山の周辺にある煮え立つ海は、再生したマナ・リグにとって安全な居場所だった。

foreignNames.name: Recifes de Shiv
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {U} ou {R}. Recifes de Shiv causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Os mares ferventes em torno de Shiv oferecem uma camada de proteção muito bem-vinda à recém-recuperada Plataforma de Mana.

foreignNames.name: 西瓦暗礁
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{U}或{R}。西瓦暗礁对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 西瓦周边的沸腾洋面，为重新夺回的魔力钻探机提供了一道不可多得的防御天堑。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

name: Sulfurous Springs
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: Everything is flammable in the Burning Isles, even the mana itself.

foreignNames.name: Schwefelquellen
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}. Die Schwefelquellen fügen dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf den Brennenden Inseln ist alles brennbar, sogar das Mana selbst.

foreignNames.name: Manantiales sulfurosos
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R}. Los Manantiales sulfurosos te hacen 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: En las Islas Ardientes, incluso el maná puede incendiarse.

foreignNames.name: Sources sulfureuses
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}. Les Sources sulfureuses vous infligent 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Tout est inflammable dans les Îles Ardentes, même le mana.

foreignNames.name: Sorgenti Sulfuree
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}. Le Sorgenti Sulfuree ti infliggono 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: Tutto è infiammabile nelle Isole Ardenti, persino il mana stesso.

foreignNames.name: 硫黄泉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。硫黄泉はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 炎熱の島々では、マナを含めてすべてが可燃性である。

foreignNames.name: Fontes Sulfurosas
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R}. Fontes Sulfurosas causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Tudo é inflamável nas Ilhas Ardentes, até mesmo o próprio mana.

foreignNames.name: 硫磺温泉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{B}或{R}。硫磺温泉对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 燃烧群岛万物皆可燃，包括法术力本身。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

name: Sunlit Marsh
text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
Sunlit Marsh enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Even the poisoned land around the Stronghold blossomed with new life in the wake of the Great Mending.

foreignNames.name: Sonniges Marschland
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {B}.)
Das Sonnige Marschland kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Selbst das vergiftete Land rund um die Felsenburg erblühte nach der Großen Wiederherstellung mit neuem Leben.

foreignNames.name: Marjal iluminado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {W} o {B}.)
El Marjal iluminado entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: Con la Reparación, la nueva vida brotó incluso en el área envenenada que rodeaba la Fortaleza.

foreignNames.name: Marécage baigné de soleil
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B}.)
Le Marécage baigné de soleil arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Même les terres empoisonnées entourant la Forteresse refleurirent après la grande Restauration.

foreignNames.name: Palude Soleggiata
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B}.)
La Palude Soleggiata entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
foreignNames.flavor: Persino le terre contaminate che circondano la Fortezza germogliarono di nuova vita dopo la Grande Riparazione.

foreignNames.name: 日向の湿地
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{W}か{B}を加える。）
日向の湿地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 要塞の周りの毒に冒された大地でさえも、大修復によって新たな生命が花を咲かせた。

foreignNames.name: Charco Ensolarado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {W} ou {B}.)
Charco Ensolarado entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Mesmo as terras envenenadas em torno da Fortaleza floresceram com vida nova depois da Grande Emenda.

foreignNames.name: 阳辉沼地
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{B}。）
阳辉沼地须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 世界愈合后，就连天罗城塞周边的剧毒土壤也绽放出新的生命。

originalText:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
Sunlit Marsh enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Tangled Islet
text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
Tangled Islet enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Many of Terisiare's islands are merely extensions of the root system of the Yavimaya magnigoth forests.

foreignNames.name: Verschlungenes Eiland
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {U}.)
Das Verschlungene Eiland kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Viele der Inseln von Terisiare sind lediglich Verlängerungen des Wurzelsystems der Magnigoth-Wälder von Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: Islote enredado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {G} o {U}.)
El Islote enredado entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: Muchas de las islas de Terisiare solo son extensiones de las raíces provenientes de los bosques de mágnigoths de Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: Îlot enchevêtré
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {U}.)
L'Îlot enchevêtré arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Bon nombre des îles de Terisiare ne sont que des extensions des racines des forêts de magnigoths de la Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: Isolotto Aggrovigliato
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {G} o {U}.)
L'Isolotto Aggrovigliato entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Molte delle isole di Terisiare non sono che estensioni del sistema radicale delle foreste di magnigoth di Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: 絡みつく島嶼域
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{G}か{U}を加える。）
絡みつく島嶼域はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: テリシアの島の多くは、遠く伸びたヤヴィマヤのマグニゴスの森の根のなのである。

foreignNames.name: Ilhota Emaranhada
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {G} ou {U}.)
Ilhota Emaranhada entra no campo de batalha virada.
foreignNames.flavor: Muitas ilhas de Terisiare são meras extensões do sistema de raízes das florestas de magnigotes de Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: 繁根孤岛
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{G}或{U}。）
繁根孤岛须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 许多泰瑞西亚岛屿不过是亚维马雅马尼古斯树林根系的延伸。

originalText:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
Tangled Islet enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Thran Portal
text:
Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

rulings.text: Thran Portal will have the appropriate intrinsic mana ability for the basic land type chosen as it enters the battlefield. It is still a Gate and still has its other abilities, including the last ability, which makes the mana ability associated with its basic land type cost 1 life to activate.
You still have to pay that mana ability’s other costs. Usually, this is just tapping the land.
If Thran Portal somehow gains another mana ability, that ability also costs an additional 1 life to activate.

If you control more than one Thran Portal, the last ability of each of them applies only to itself. That is, controlling a second Thran Portal does not make mana abilities of all cards named Thran Portal cost an additional 2 life.

If a Thran Portal somehow enters the battlefield without a basic land type having been chosen for it, it does not have any mana abilities. The same is true for a land that is already on the battlefield that becomes a copy of it.

If a land enters the battlefield as a copy of Thran Portal (as opposed to a land that is already on the battlefield becoming a copy of it), its controller gets to choose a basic land type for it and it has that type.

foreignNames.name: Thran-Portal
foreignNames.text:
Das Thran-Portal kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder weniger andere Länder.
Sowie das Thran-Portal ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Standardlandtyp.
Das Thran-Portal hat zusätzlich zu seinen anderen Typen den bestimmten Typ.
Manafähigkeiten des Thran-Portals kosten beim Aktivieren zusätzlich 1 Lebenspunkt.

foreignNames.name: Portal thran
foreignNames.text:
El Portal thran entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles otras dos o menos tierras.
En cuanto el Portal thran entre al campo de batalla, elige un tipo de tierra básica.
El Portal thran es del tipo elegido además de sus otros tipos.
Te cuesta 1 vida adicional activar las habilidades de maná del Portal thran.

foreignNames.name: Portail thran
foreignNames.text:
Le Portail thran arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez deux autres terrains ou moins.
Au moment où le Portail thran arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un type de terrain de base.
Le Portail thran a le type choisi en plus de ses autres types.
Les capacités de mana du Portail thran coûtent 1 point de vie supplémentaire à activer.

foreignNames.name: Portale Thran
foreignNames.text:
Il Portale Thran entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli al massimo altre due terre.
Mentre il Portale Thran entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un tipo di terra base.
Il Portale Thran ha il tipo scelto in aggiunta ai suoi altri tipi.
Le abilità di mana del Portale Thran costano 1 punto vita addizionale per essere attivate.

foreignNames.name: スランの門
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない３つ以上の土地をコントロールしているかぎり、スランの門はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
スランの門が戦場に出るに際し、基本土地タイプ１つを選ぶ。
スランの門は、他のタイプに加えてその選ばれたタイプでもある。
スランの門のマナ能力を起動するための追加コストとして、１点のライフを支払う。

foreignNames.name: Portal Thran
foreignNames.text:
Portal Thran entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle dois outros terrenos ou menos.
Conforme Portal Thran entra no campo de batalha, escolha um tipo de terreno básico.
Portal Thran é do tipo escolhido além de seus outros tipos.
As habilidades de mana de Portal Thran custam 1 ponto de vida a mais para serem ativadas.

foreignNames.name: 索蓝境界通道
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更少其他地，否则索蓝境界通道须横置进战场。
于索蓝境界通道进战场时，选择一种基本地类别。
索蓝境界通道额外具有该类别。
索蓝境界通道的法术力异能须额外支付1点生命来起动。

originalText:
Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

name: Wooded Ridgeline
text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Wooded Ridgeline enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: The power of long-forgotten empires still pulses in the earth of Dominaria, giving rise to strange, mana-rich pockets of growth.

foreignNames.name: Bewaldete Kammlinie
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}.)
Die Bewaldete Kammlinie kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Macht längst vergessener Imperien pulsiert immer noch in der Erde von Dominaria und erschafft merkwürdige, manareiche Wachstumsnischen.

foreignNames.name: Cresta boscosa
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {G}.)
La Cresta boscosa entra al campo de batalla girada.
foreignNames.flavor: El poder de los imperios ya olvidados permanece en la superficie de Dominaria, lo que crea extraños relieves repletos de maná.

foreignNames.name: Crêtes boisées
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}.)
Les Crêtes boisées arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
foreignNames.flavor: La puissance d'empires oubliés par le temps fait encore vibrer la terre de Dominaria, donnant naissance à d'étranges poches de croissance riches en mana.

foreignNames.name: Crinale Boscoso
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}.)
Il Crinale Boscoso entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Il potere di antichi imperi dimenticati pulsa ancora nel cuore di Dominaria, dando vita a strane concentrazioni di crescita ricche di mana.

foreignNames.name: 樹木茂る尾根
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。）
樹木茂る尾根はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: ドミナリアの大地には忘れ去られて久しい帝国の力が今でも脈打つ。これにより、豊富なマナを湛えた風変わりな成長が伺える。

foreignNames.name: Cume Arborizado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}.)
Cume Arborizado entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: O poder de impérios há muito esquecidos ainda pulsa na terra de Dominária, dando origem a bolsões de vida ricos em mana.

foreignNames.name: 林木山脊
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{G}。）
林木山脊须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 遭忘已久的王朝力量仍在多明纳里亚地表脉动，令各地纷纷出现许多富含法术力的奇异植生区域。

originalText:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Wooded Ridgeline enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Yavimaya Coast
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: As magnigoth trees expanded across the sea into Almaaz and New Argive, it became clear Yavimaya's borders were never confined by its coastline.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

foreignNames.name: Yavimayaküste
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {U}. Die Yavimayaküste fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Als sich Magnigoth-Bäume über das Meer nach Almaaz und Neu-Argivia ausbreiteten, wurde klar, dass die Grenzen von Yavimaya noch nie durch seine Küstenlinie bestimmt wurden.

foreignNames.name: Costa de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {G} o {U}. La Costa de Yavimaya te hace 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: A medida que los árboles mágnigoth atravesaban el mar para llegar a Almaaz y Nueva Argivia, quedó claro que la costa de Yavimaya nunca restringió sus fronteras.

foreignNames.name: Côte de la Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {U}. La Côte de la Yavimaya vous inflige 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Tandis que les magnigoths se répandaient au-delà de la mer en Almaaz et en Nouvelle Argive, il devint clair que les frontières de la Yavimaya n'étaient pas confinées à ses côtes.

foreignNames.name: Costa di Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o {U}. La Costa di Yavimaya ti infligge 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: Man mano che gli alberi di magnigoth si espandevano attraverso il mare verso Almaaz e Nuova Argivia, divenne chiaro che i confini di Yavimaya non erano mai stati limitati dalla sua costa.

foreignNames.name: ヤヴィマヤの沿岸
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{G}か{U}を加える。ヤヴィマヤの沿岸はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: マグニゴスの樹々が海を渡りアルマーズや新アルガイヴまで拡大すると、ヤヴィマヤの境界線が海岸によって区切られていないということが明らかになった。

foreignNames.name: Costa de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {U}. Costa de Yavimaya causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Conforme as árvores de magnigote se expandiram além-mar para Almaaz e o Novo Argivo, ficou claro que as fronteiras de Yavimaya jamais foram limitadas a seu litoral.

foreignNames.name: 亚维马雅海岸
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{G}或{U}。亚维马雅海岸对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 随着马尼古斯树穿越大海扎根阿玛兹和新阿基夫，大家方才醒悟亚维马雅的边界绝不会受海岸束缚。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
